summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Image Upload and Vision Analysis Flow. Backend vision service successfully handles both Base64 and URL inputs with proper Gemini 2.0 Flash integration. Frontend UI properly displays upload area, file input, and vision analysis modal with detailed results.

design_issues.issue: Missing Description warning in console for DialogContent

passed_tests: Vision Analysis with Base64 image data (1x1 pixel PNG)
Vision Analysis with public URL (Pexels image)
Vision Analysis graceful fallback for invalid data
Frontend image upload area display and clickability
File input element presence and configuration
Vision Analysis modal display with semantic anchors, technical assessment, and pillar suggestions
Complete login flow and mode selection (PRO MODE)
